name: lost ruin (wip)
description:
lost ruins is a text based story game. it runs with batch script. right now theirs not to much to do but I hope to constantly expand on the game. i'm showing the small amount of content I have so i can get some feedback early on. also they way i'm programming this makes it really hard to to fix the early on problems. so I really hope you enjoy my tiny little side project!

programs used: notepad.

download instructions: once the file has been installed, simply run the batch file.
